title: Nvidia to invest $100 billion in OpenAI, linking two artificial intelligence titans
description: Nvidia will invest up to $100 billion in OpenAI and supply it with data centre chips, the companies said on Monday.
content:
Nvidia will invest up to $100 billion in OpenAI and supply it with data centre chips, the companies said on Monday, marking a tie-up between two of the highest-profile players in the global artificial intelligence race.
The move underscores the incre... [4361 chars]

title: What you will and won't see at this year's UN General Assembly
description: The United Nations General Assembly is set to host over 140 world leaders in New York. Discussions will focus on resolving conflicts in Europe and the Middle East. Climate change and artificial intelligence are also key agenda items. Financial challenges facing the UN will be addressed. A two-state solution conference for the Israeli-Palestinian conflict already took place.
content:

title: China’s 10-Year Plan for AI Dystopia
description: Learn about the AI+ initiative set to embed artificial intelligence in six strategic areas of Chinese society over the next decade.
content:
Intelligent terminals and AI agents will be everywhere.
The Chinese State Council released its bold new plan: AI+. AI+ is a state-driven technology initiative that aims to transform every aspect of Chinese society with AI.
This ten-year plan pushes t... [4438 chars]

title: An $800 Billion Revenue Shortfall Threatens AI Future, Bain Says
description: Artificial intelligence companies like OpenAI have been quick to unveil plans for spending hundreds of billions of dollars on data centers, but they have been slower to show how they will pull in revenue to cover all those expenses. Now, the consulting firm Bain & Co. is estimating the shortfall could be far larger than previously understood.
content: (Bloomberg) -- Artificial intelligence companies like OpenAI have been quick to unveil plans for spending hundreds of billions of dollars on data centers, but they have been slower to show how they will pull in revenue to cover all those expenses. No... [3279 chars]

title: New DES minister urged to prioritise AI
description: Three major industry organisations are urging Chaichanok Chidchob, the incoming digital economy and society (DES) minister, to prioritise the national artificial intelligence (AI) policy and sovereign technology development.
content:
Three major industry organisations are urging Chaichanok Chidchob, the incoming digital economy and society (DES) minister, to prioritise the national artificial intelligence (AI) policy and sovereign technology development.

title: FBR launches AI-powered chatbot for taxpayer facilitation
description: ISLAMABAD: Breaking new ground in Pakistan’s public sector, the Federal Board of Revenue has developed an Artificial Intelligence -based ChatBot to provide general information to the public...
content:
ISLAMABAD: Breaking new ground in Pakistan’s public sector, the Federal Board of Revenue (FBR) has developed an Artificial Intelligence (AI)-based ChatBot to provide general information to the public on various tax-related queries.

title: NSW public school students from years 5-12 to get AI in the classroom
description: Tens of thousands of Australian schoolchildren will soon have access to purpose-built artificial intelligence in the classroom.
content:
The NSW government will roll out purpose-built artificial intelligence to all public school students from year 5 and up next term after a successful trial in 50 schools.
NSWEduChat, a purpose-built generative AI app, is curriculum aligned and will al... [1697 chars]

title: Indo-Australian delegation calls on CM, proposes transformative CSR initiatives for J&K
description: Excelsior Correspondent SRINAGAR, Sept 22: Chief Minister Omar Abdullah today met with an Indo-Australian delegation led by Sajid Saiyed, Chairperson and Founder of Bharat CSR Network and the Circular Economy Alliance Australia (CEAA), to discuss a range of Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR) projects aimed at fostering sustainable development in Jammu and Kashmir. The delegation proposed a range of initiatives aimed at promoting community empowerment and environmental sustainability, including the establishment of Smart Villages, setting up Artificial Intelligence (AI) Labs, implementing […]
content:
